tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transportation_ticketing (
  ticket_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  passenger_name VARCHAR(50),
  mode_of_transport VARCHAR(20),
  departure_date DATE,
  departure_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    airline_name VARCHAR(255),
    departure_city VARCHAR(255),
    arrival_city VARCHAR(255),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE trains (
    train_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    train_name VARCHAR(255),
    departure_station VARCHAR(255),
    arrival_station VARCHAR(255),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    airline_id INT,
    flight_number INT,
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (airline_id) REFERENCES airlines(airline_id)
);

CREATE TABLE passengers (
    passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    ticket_number INT,
    flight_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (flight_id) REFERENCES flights(flight_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AirlineTickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_name VARCHAR(255),
    flight_number VARCHAR(10),
    departure_date DATE,
    departure_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE TrainTickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_name VARCHAR(255),
    train_number VARCHAR(10),
    departure_date DATE,
    departure_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE BusTickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_name VARCHAR(255),
    bus_number VARCHAR(10),
    departure_date DATE,
    departure_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE CruiseTickets (
    ticket_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_name VARCHAR(255),
    cruise_ship_name VARCHAR(50),
    departure_date DATE,
    departure_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    flight_number VARCHAR(50),
    departure_city VARCHAR(50),
    arrival_city VARCHAR(50),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE trains (
    train_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    train_number VARCHAR(50),
    origin_station VARCHAR(50),
    destination_station VARCHAR(50),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE buses (
    bus_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    bus_number VARCHAR(50),
    from_city VARCHAR(50),
    to_city VARCHAR(50),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE passengers (
    passenger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_name VARCHAR(50),
    passenger_email VARCHAR(50),
    passenger_phone VARCHAR(20),
    passenger_address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE reservations (
    reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    passenger_id INT,
    transport_mode VARCHAR(50),
    transport_id INT,
    reservation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE payment_details (
    payment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reservation_id INT,
    payment_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    payment_date TIMESTAMP
)
